company.name: Social Funnel
company.tagline: Client Acquisition Systems for High-Ticket Businesses
company.description: Social Funnel is a Kenyan-based marketing agency that provides end-to-end Business Development solutions to businesses dealing in high ticket services and products. Our ideal client has a minimum product value of $10,000 (>Ksh 1M) per sale. We offer a tested and proven Lead Generation solution, and we set up dedicated call centres for our clients to nurture the Leads through the Funnel.
company.mission: To build client acquisition systems that create predictable revenue and freedom for service businesses—while funding generational impact across Africa. We use our skills to solve real-world problems.

location.address: P. O. Box 1215 - 10400, Cape Chestnut, Nanyuki

hero.subtitle: Building Client Acquisition Systems for High-Ticket Businesses
hero.description: We specialize in businesses with minimum product values of $10,000+ per sale, creating predictable revenue through proven automation systems.

services.title: Client Acquisition Funnels
services.shortDescription: High-converting landing pages and automated lead capture sequences that maximize conversions
services.fullDescription: We map and design the entire customer journey—from the first ad click to a booked appointment. Our funnels are built to maximize conversions at every step, using data-driven testing and proven frameworks.
features: High-converting landing pages tailored to your industry
Automated lead capture and follow-up sequences
Conversion tracking to measure ROI at every stage
services.result: More qualified leads, consistently filling your pipeline.

services.title: AI-Powered Chatbots & CRM Systems
services.shortDescription: 24/7 chatbot support with automated lead scoring and CRM integrations
services.fullDescription: Your leads don't want to wait. We set up intelligent chatbots that respond instantly, answer questions, and qualify prospects—all while syncing to your CRM.
features: 24/7 chatbot support for instant lead response
Automated lead scoring so you know who's ready to buy
CRM setup and integrations to keep your sales organized
services.result: No missed opportunities—every prospect is followed up, every lead tracked.

services.title: Paid Ads That Actually Work
services.shortDescription: Facebook, Instagram & Google Ads with precision targeting for decision-makers
services.fullDescription: We don't waste money on 'likes' or vanity metrics. Our ad campaigns are laser-focused on one thing: client acquisition.
features: Facebook, Instagram & Google Ads built for ROI
Precision targeting to reach decision-makers in your industry
Continuous testing and optimization to lower cost per lead
services.result: More clients for less ad spend.

services.title: Automation Systems
services.shortDescription: Sales running on autopilot while you focus on delivery
services.fullDescription: We take the manual, repetitive work off your plate and replace it with smart automation.
features: Automated booking flows that sync to your calendar
Email/SMS follow-ups that nurture leads until they're ready
Lead qualification workflows to prioritize high-value prospects
services.result: Sales running on autopilot, while you focus on delivery.

services.title: Brand & Funnel Design
services.shortDescription: Professional design that builds instant credibility and converts leads
services.fullDescription: Your funnel isn't just a system—it's also the first impression your clients get of your business. We design with clarity, trust, and authority in mind.
features: Clean, professional funnel pages that build instant credibility
Persuasive copywriting that moves clients to take action
Brand-aligned design so you look as good as you perform
services.result: A brand presence that inspires confidence and converts leads into long-term clients.

services.title: Strategic Communications & Campaigns
services.shortDescription: Campaigns that shift perception, win attention, and deliver measurable outcomes
services.fullDescription: We don't just market—we tell stories that move people and mobilize action. Whether it's a product launch, a corporate rebrand, or a national advocacy campaign, we craft narratives that cut through noise and build trust.
features: Multi-channel execution: social, digital, print, and on-ground activations
Influencer engagement, PR, and stakeholder alignment
Data-driven monitoring and reporting to show real impact
services.result: Campaigns that don't just look good—they shift perception, win attention, and deliver measurable outcomes.

whyChooseUs.title: High-Ticket Expertise
whyChooseUs.description: We specialize in businesses with minimum product values of $10,000+ per sale, understanding the unique challenges of high-ticket industries

whyChooseUs.title: ROI-Focused Approach
whyChooseUs.description: We prioritize measurable results over vanity metrics. Every campaign is built to deliver qualified leads and actual revenue growth

whyChooseUs.title: Scalable Systems
whyChooseUs.description: Our automation systems grow with your business, providing sustainable lead generation that doesn't require constant manual work

testimonials.name: Richard S. Robertson
testimonials.text: Social Funnel transformed our lead generation process. We went from struggling to find qualified prospects to having a consistent pipeline of high-value clients.

testimonials.name: Sarah M. Johnson
testimonials.text: The automation systems they built for us saved us countless hours while increasing our conversion rates by 300%. Truly exceptional service.

testimonials.name: David K. Mwangi
testimonials.text: Their understanding of high-ticket sales processes is unmatched. They helped us scale from 2 clients per month to 15+ qualified leads weekly.

primary.title: Ready to Build Your Client Acquisition System?
primary.description: Not sure where to begin? Book a discovery call with us and let's discuss how we can help scale your high-ticket business.

secondary.title: Let's Work Together
secondary.description: Transform your business with proven automation systems

seo.title: Social Funnel - Client Acquisition Systems for High-Ticket Businesses
seo.description: Social Funnel - Kenyan marketing agency specializing in client acquisition systems for high-ticket businesses. Lead generation, automation, and ROI-focused campaigns.
seo.keywords: marketing agency Kenya, lead generation, client acquisition, high-ticket sales, marketing automation, Nanyuki marketing, business development
seo.author: Social Funnel

team.name: Elvis Wangari
team.bio: Expert in high-ticket client acquisition with over 8 years of experience in marketing automation and business development.
